segments.text: Ah , Hello . So , you are back ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I received everything in the post this morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's good . Could I please see the originals of everything ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're pretty lucky actually , today is higher than yesterday . It's 824 . 71 RIB for 100 USD .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great ! Do you need me to sign anything ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Please sign your name at the bottom of the Exchange Receipt . Thanks very much and here's your money .
segments.speaker: S1
